segment.source: Get-RequestForUpdate cmdlet
segment.target: Get-RequestForUpdate cmdlet

segment.source: Get-RequestForUpdate cmdlet
segment.target: Get-RequestForUpdate cmdlet

segment.source: Get-RequestForUpdate cmdlet
segment.target: Get-RequestForUpdate cmdlet

segment.source: Use the Get-RequestForUpdate cmdlet to retrieve the current status of a request for update.
segment.target: Use the Get-RequestForUpdate cmdlet to retrieve the current status of a request for update.

segment.source: This is the syntax for Get-RequestForUpdate.
segment.target: This is the syntax for Get-RequestForUpdate.

segment.source: Syntax
segment.target: Syntax

segment.source: Parameters
segment.target: Parameters

segment.source: Typically, the only parameters specified to this cmdlet are RequestForUpdateTicketId.
segment.target: Typically, the only parameters specified to this cmdlet are RequestForUpdateTicketId.

segment.source: Output
segment.target: Output

segment.source: This cmdlet returns a Microsoft.Phone.PartnerServices.Cmdlets.RequestForUpdate object that contains the following fields.
segment.target: This cmdlet returns a Microsoft.Phone.PartnerServices.Cmdlets.RequestForUpdate object that contains the following fields.

segment.source: Status
segment.target: Status

segment.source: This is the progress of the RFU submission.
segment.target: This is the progress of the RFU submission.

segment.source: The following are the members of the status field.
segment.target: The following are the members of the status field.

segment.source: ErrorCode.
segment.target: ErrorCode.

segment.source: This is the error code of the error that was encountered.
segment.target: This is the error code of the error that was encountered.

segment.source: ErrorMessage.
segment.target: ErrorMessage.

segment.source: This contains the messaged related to the failed RFU submission.
segment.target: This contains the messaged related to the failed RFU submission.

segment.source: Status.
segment.target: Status.

segment.source: This contains the status state of the current RFU submission.
segment.target: This contains the status state of the current RFU submission.

segment.source: The following list contains the status states.
segment.target: The following list contains the status states.

segment.source: InProcessOnTrack.
segment.target: InProcessOnTrack.

segment.source: The RFU submission is currently in progress.
segment.target: The RFU submission is currently in progress.

segment.source: InProcessFailure.
segment.target: InProcessFailure.

segment.source: The RFU submission completed with a failure; however, the user still has the option to retry.
segment.target: The RFU submission completed with a failure; however, the user still has the option to retry.

segment.source: CompletedFailure.
segment.target: CompletedFailure.

segment.source: The RFU submission completed with a failure and the user chose not to retry.
segment.target: The RFU submission completed with a failure and the user chose not to retry.

segment.source: CompletedSuccess.
segment.target: CompletedSuccess.

segment.source: The RFU submission is completed with no issues.
segment.target: The RFU submission is completed with no issues.

segment.source: FailedToRetrieveStatus.
segment.target: FailedToRetrieveStatus.

segment.source: This means that the status calculation failed.
segment.target: This means that the status calculation failed.

segment.source: The ErrorMessage in this case is “An error occurred while retrieve the RFU status.
segment.target: The ErrorMessage in this case is “An error occurred while retrieve the RFU status.

segment.source: No action is required by the OEM.
segment.target: No action is required by the OEM.

segment.source: Microsoft will be investigating the issue that caused this.”
segment.target: Microsoft will be investigating the issue that caused this.”

segment.source: Exceptions
segment.target: Exceptions

segment.source: The following exceptions are thrown for their corresponding error scenarios.
segment.target: The following exceptions are thrown for their corresponding error scenarios.

segment.source: FaultExceptionArgumentFaultDetail
segment.target: FaultExceptionArgumentFaultDetail

segment.source: An invalid ticket ID was provided.
segment.target: An invalid ticket ID was provided.

segment.source: The ticket ID was either null or empty.
segment.target: The ticket ID was either null or empty.

segment.source: FaultExceptionInvalidOperationFaultDetail
segment.target: FaultExceptionInvalidOperationFaultDetail

segment.source: An invalid ticket ID was provided.
segment.target: An invalid ticket ID was provided.

segment.source: The ticket ID is not defined in the service.
segment.target: The ticket ID is not defined in the service.

segment.source: The authenticated user is not the owner of the firmware submission.
segment.target: The authenticated user is not the owner of the firmware submission.

segment.source: The ticket ID is a resubmission ticket.
segment.target: The ticket ID is a resubmission ticket.

segment.source: Scenarios
segment.target: Scenarios

segment.source: Retrieve the status of a successfully processed request for update
segment.target: Retrieve the status of a successfully processed request for update

segment.source: Scenario prerequisites
segment.target: Scenario prerequisites

segment.source: A request for update has been successfully submitted.
segment.target: A request for update has been successfully submitted.

segment.source: The request for update ticket number is available.
segment.target: The request for update ticket number is available.

segment.target: Example usage with expected output

segment.target: Attempt to retrieve the status for an RFU when the ticket does not exist

segment.target: An OEM is attempting to retrieve an RFU ticket number that does not exist.
